# Onboarding Terminology Checklist

| Term found in emails | Term used in wizard | Match? (Y/N) | Notes / action |
|----------------------|--------------------|--------------|----------------|
| Workspace            |                    |              |                |
| Member               |                    |              |                |
| Coach                |                    |              |                |
| Automation           |                    |              |                |
| Permissions          |                    |              |                |

Instructions:
- Copy/paste phrases from marketing or support material.
- Compare against onscreen language; flag mismatches.
- Decide whether to change UI copy or escalate to content design.
